member.name: T:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions
member.summary: A set of CSS and form based extension methods for .

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ClickButtonWithValue(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Clicks a button that has the given value.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ClickButtonWithId(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Clicks a button with the id ending with the provided value.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.SelectItemInList(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Selects an item from a drop down box using the given CSS id and the itemIndex.
member.param: A zero-based index that determines which drop down box to target from the CSS selector (assuming the CSS selector returns more than one drop down box).

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.SelectItemInList(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Selects an item from the nth drop down box (based on the elementIndex argument), using the given CSS id and the itemIndex.
member.param: A zero-based index that determines which drop down box to target from the CSS selector (assuming the CSS selector returns more than one drop down box).
The element in the drop down list to select.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ElementCount(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the number of elements that match the given CSS selector.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.SelectedIndex(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the selected index from a drop down box using the given CSS selector.
member.returns: The index of the selected item in the drop down box

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.SelectedIndex(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the selected index from the nth drop down box (based on the elementIndex argument), using the given CSS selector.
member.param: A zero-based index that determines which drop down box to target from the CSS selector (assuming the CSS selector returns more than one drop down box).
member.returns: The index of the selected item in the drop down box

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.SelectedItemValue(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the selected value from a drop down box using the given CSS selector.
member.returns: The value of the selected item.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ClickLinkWithText(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Clicks a link with the text provided. This is case sensitive and searches using an Xpath contains() search.
member.param: The link text to search for.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ClickLinkWithId(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Clicks a link with the id ending with the provided value.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.Click(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Clicks an element using the given CSS selector.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.Click(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clicks an element using the given CSS selector.
member.param: A zero-based index that determines which element to target from the CSS selector (assuming the CSS selector returns more than one element).

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.InputWithId(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an input element with the id ending with the provided value.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ElementValueWithId(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an element's value with the id ending with the provided value.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ElementValue(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an element's value using the given CSS selector.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ElementValue(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an element's value using the given CSS selector.
member.param: A zero-based index that determines which element to target from the CSS selector (assuming the CSS selector returns more than one element).

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ElementText(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an element's text using the given CSS selector.
member.param: A zero-based index that determines which element to target from the CSS selector (assuming the CSS selector returns more than one element).

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.IsCheckboxChecked(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Return true if the checkbox with the id ending with the provided value is checked/selected.
member.returns: True if the checkbox is checked.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.ClickCheckbox(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Clicks the checkbox with the id ending with the provided value.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.SetValue(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.String)
member.summary: Sets an element's (an input field) value to the provided text by using SendKeys().

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.SetValue(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets an element's (an input field) value to the provided text, using the given CSS selector and using SendKeys().

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.SetValue(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets an element's (an input field) value to the provided text, using the given CSS selector and using SendKeys().
member.param: A zero-based index that determines which element to target from the CSS selector (assuming the CSS selector returns more than one element).

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.FillTextBox(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the textbox with the given CSS id to the provided value.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.FillTextArea(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the textarea with the given CSS id to the provided value.
member.param: The text to set the value to.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.Wait(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.Double)
member.summary: Waits the specified time in second (using a thread sleep)
member.param: The number of seconds to wait (this uses TimeSpan.FromSeconds)

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.WaitForPageLoad(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver)
member.summary: Waits 2 seconds, which is *usually* the maximum time needed for all Javascript execution to finish on the page.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.WaitForElementDisplayed(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32)
member.summary: Waits for an elements to be displayed on the page for the time specified.
member.param: The selector to find the element with.
The number of seconds to wait

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverExtensions.IsElementDisplayed(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the element provided by the selector is displayed or not, waiting a certain amount of time for it to be displayed.
member.param: The selector to find the element with.
The number of seconds to wait.
member.returns: True if the element is displayed, false otherwise.
